price: 33. Ir suteikėme jiems ženklus, kuriuose buvo aiškus išbandymas
arabic: وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَٰٓؤٞاْ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waātaynāhum mina al-āyāti mā fīhi balāon mubīnun
